keyInsight: 3 of 7 'REAL' users are actually FAKE - Security Scanner bots clicked Magic Links, auto-accounts were created, but they never generated anything. Only 4 users actually engaged with the product.

outreach.note: Bot filter FIXED 2026-01-18! Burst detection was removing ALL real clicks. Now using user-agent detection only.
outreach.FIX_DETAILS: filterSequentialClicks() disabled - was marking any minute with 3+ clicks as 'burst' and removing all. Real people check email at similar times!
outreach.WICHTIG_KONTEXT: Diese Metriken zaehlen NICHT weil: (1) SES war im SANDBOX Modus (max 200/Tag, nur verifizierte Adressen), (2) Lead-Qualitaet noch nicht optimiert, (3) Email-Templates im Test. ECHTER START erst wenn SES Production (50k/Monat) aktiv!

sesStatus.note: Erst nach SES Production Approval zaehlen die Email-Metriken wirklich!
